Root Cause: Unhandled exception in application code leading to internal server error

Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Observations: The application is returning a 500 Internal Server Error when accessing the /api/data endpoint, indicating a server-side issue.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Impact: Users are unable to access the /api/data endpoint, potentially leading to loss of functionality or data.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Correlations: This issue may be related to other application logs showing unhandled exceptions or errors in the same time frame.

Explanation.Conclusion: The most likely root cause is an unhandled exception in the application code, possibly due to a bug or missing configuration.
